short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pin important chatGPT discussions for quick access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PinGPTies is a simple Chrome extension designed to keep you organized in ChatGPT. 

Don’t get lost in endless conversations — pin important discussions with just a click for quick access later.

Whether you're working on projects, learning, or saving useful tips, PinGPTies helps you stay on top of your key conversations without the hassle of scrolling through your chat history.
